title: (x) Very readable terminal font - Terminus {Rainer via self (Susan)}
content:
I found this font [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323041011/http:/www.uzbl.org/wiki/_media/acid3.png). I really want to use this font for my terminals.. does anyone recognize it?
